description: Create a relaxed, yet traditional, style statement in the bath with faucets and accessories. Multiple faucet designs and finish choices give you a variety of decorating options to truly enhance and personalize your space.

The ever-popular Chateau collection features soft, clean curves and modern, rounded styling - a proven classic. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
